name: Inochi Project
blurb: The online game where you create, customise and play as interchangeable robotic ani-mechs.

rewards.reward: Approx: $1.60, \u20ac1.20 \r\n============================== \u25cf A heart-felt thanks. Thank you so much for backing, every pound counts and your hard earned currency will all help the Inochi Project grow.

Approx: $8, \u20ac6 ============================== EXCLUSIVE PRODUCTION GAME ART ============================== \u25cf EXCLUSIVE digital GAME ART images. Enjoy this exclusive downloadable content of development art and behind the scenes sketches from the team who make Inochi Project. This content will only be available to backers of Inochi Project on Kickstarter and nowhere else.

Approx: $16, \u20ac12 ============================== EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE GAME BETA VERSION + EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPER FORUM ============================== \u25cf BETA ACCESS to the GAME.           \u25cf Access to EXCLUSIVE backer-only developer FORUM AREA, containing feedback, discussion and polls. Here you, the backers, can help decide the future of the Inochi world and vote on characters and unlock packs that get put in to the game. You know games and we would love your feedback on how you think we can make Inochi Project even better.

Approx: $24, \u20ac18 ============================== BRONZE GAME PACK + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF SOUNDTRACK FROM INOCHI PROJECT + EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE GAME BETA VERSION + EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPER FORUM ============================== \u25cf Wow, now those rewards are really starting to mount up! At this level you now receive the Bronze game pack which includes; \u25cf 3 Month Subscription to the Game \u25cf Bronze 'Mechoin' pack of in-game currency \u25cf You get to tantalise your ears with some of the soundtracks and audio themes from Inochi Project, as composed by W.Bone.

Approx: $33, \u20ac24 ============================== SILVER GAME PACK + EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER TEXTURE PACK + NAME IN CREDITS + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF SOUNDTRACK FROM INOCHI PROJECT + EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE GAME BETA VERSION + EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPER FORUM ============================== \u25cf Silver game pack: \u25cf 6 Month Subscription to the Game \u25cf Silver 'Mechoin' pack of in-game currency \u25cf Tantalise your ears with some of the soundtracks and audio themes from Inochi Project, as composed by W.Bone \u25cf Exclusive "BACKER" KickStarter texture pack for in-game characters \u25cf And as a pioneer backing Inochi Project, your name will appear in the credits to the game under the SILVER Backer category.

Approx: $50, \u20ac36 ============================== GOLD GAME PACK + EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME CHARACTER SKIN + EXCLUSIVE GOLD PLAQUE FOR YOUR IN-GAME HOME AREA + EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER TEXTURE PACK + NAME IN CREDITS + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF SOUNDTRACK FROM INOCHI PROJECT + EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE GAME BETA VERSION + EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPER FORUM ============================== \u25cf Gold game pack: \u25cf 12 Month Subscription to the Game \u25cf Gold 'Mechoin' pack of in-game currency \u25cf Tantalise your ears with some of the soundtracks and audio themes from Inochi Project, as composed by W.Bone \u25cf Exclusive Character Skin for use in game \u25cf Exclusive 'Gold Plaque' for your in-game home area \u25cf Exclusive "GOLD BACKER" KickStarter texture pack for in-game characters \u25cf And if that's not enough your name will appear in the credits to the game under the GOLD Backer category

Gold game pack: \u25cf 12 Month Subscription to the Game \u25cf 2000 Blaps worth of in-game currency \u25cf Tantalise your ears with some of the soundtracks and audio themes from Inochi Project, as composed by W.Bone \u25cf Exclusive Character Skin for use in-game \u25cf Exclusive 'Hero Plaque' for your in-game home area \u25cf Exclusive "HERO BACKER" KickStarter texture pack for in-game characters \u25cf And if that's not enough your name will appear in the credits to the game under the HERO Backer category. [* Displayed names are subject to approval and cannot be inappropriate or offensive]

Approx: $163, \u20ac119 ============================== HAVE AN IN-GAME BUILDING IN SHINE CITY NAMED* AFTER YOU + YOUR NAME* DISPLAYED IN-GAME ON THE 'WALL OF HEROES MONUMENT' IN THE CENTRAL PLAZA OF SHINE CITY \u25cf GOLD GAME PACK + EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME CHARACTER SKIN + EXCLUSIVE GOLD PLAQUE FOR YOUR IN-GAME HOME AREA + EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER TEXTURE PACK + NAME IN CREDITS + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF SOUNDTRACK FROM INOCHI PROJECT + EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE GAME BETA VERSION + EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPER FORUM ============================== \u25cf Become a real feature of the Inochi Project game world and have your name immortalised in-game on a building within Shine City \u25cf You will also get your name proudly displayed for all other players to see on the "Wall of Heroes" Monument in the Central Plaza of Shine City. Approx: $823, \u20ac597 ============================== ULTRA RARE ANI-MECH CHARACTER SKIN + HAVE AN IN-GAME STATUE OF YOUR ANI-MECH CHARACTER BUILT AND ON DISPLAY IN 'THE PARADE OF LEGENDS' AREA WITHIN SHINE CITY + YOUR NAME* DISPLAYED IN-GAME ON THE 'WALL OF LEGENDS MONUMENT' IN THE CENTRAL PLAZA OF SHINE CITY \u25cf GOLD GAME PACK + EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME CHARACTER SKIN + EXCLUSIVE GOLD PLAQUE FOR YOUR IN-GAME HOME AREA + EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER TEXTURE PACK + NAME IN CREDITS + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF SOUNDTRACK FROM INOCHI PROJECT + EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE GAME BETA VERSION + EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPER FORUM ============================== \u25cf Back the project at this level and you will be rewarded with the EXCLUSIVITY of being one of only a handful of players who will have access to an ULTRA-RARE character skin \u25cf Plus you get to become one of the legends of Shine City by having a statue of your Ani-Mech character built and displayed in the Shine City 'Parade of Legends' area \u25cf You will also become part of Inochi History with your name appearing on "Wall of Legends" Monument. The ONLY WAY you can get your name on this monument is through this KICKSTARTER \u25cf Gold game pack: \u25cf 12 Month Subscription to the Game \u25cf Gold 'Mechoin' pack of in-game currency \u25cf Tantalise your ears with some of the soundtracks and audio themes from Inochi Project, as composed by W.Bone \u25cf Exclusive Character Skin for use in-game \u25cf Exclusive 'Legend Plaque' for your in-game home area \u25cf Exclusive "LEGEND BACKER" KickStarter texture pack for in-game characters \u25cf And if that's not enough your name will appear in the credits to the game under the LEGEND Backer category.  [* Displayed names are subject to approval and cannot be inappropriate or offensive]

Approx: $2474, \u20ac1794 ============================== DESIGN YOUR OWN ANI-MECH CHARACTER TO GO IN THE GAME + ULTRA RARE ANI-MECH CHARACTER SKIN + HAVE AN IN-GAME STATUE OF YOUR ANI-MECH CHARACTER BUILT AND ON DISPLAY IN 'THE PARADE OF LEGENDS' AREA WITHIN SHINE CITY + YOUR NAME* DISPLAYED IN-GAME ON THE 'WALL OF LEGENDS MONUMENT' IN THE CENTRAL PLAZA OF SHINE CITY \u25cf GOLD GAME PACK + EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME CHARACTER SKIN + EXCLUSIVE GOLD PLAQUE FOR YOUR IN-GAME HOME AREA + EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER TEXTURE PACK + NAME IN CREDITS + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF SOUNDTRACK FROM INOCHI PROJECT + EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE GAME BETA VERSION + EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPER FORUM ============================== \u25cf At this level you will work with our design team to design your own Ani-Mech character and have it featured in the game as an unlockable character and customisable components \u25cf Become one of only a handful of players who will have access to an ULTRA-RARE character skin \u25cf Plus you get to become one of the legends of Shine City by having a statue of your Ani-Mech character built and displayed in the Shine City 'Parade of Legends' area \u25cf You will also become part of Inochi History with your name appearing on "Wall of Legends" Monument. The ONLY WAY you can get your name on this monument is through this KICKSTARTER \u25cf Gold game pack: \u25cf 12 Month Subscription to the Game \u25cf Gold 'Mechoin' pack of in-game currency \u25cf Tantalise your ears with some of the soundtracks and audio themes from Inochi Project, as composed by W.Bone \u25cf Exclusive Character Skin for use in-game \u25cf Exclusive 'Legend Plaque' for your in-game home area \u25cf Exclusive "LEGEND BACKER" KickStarter texture pack for in-game characters \u25cf And if that's not enough your name will appear in the credits to the game under the LEGEND Backer category.  [* Displayed names are subject to approval and cannot be inappropriate or offensive]

Approx: $4949, \u20ac3591 ============================== DESIGN YOUR OWN QUEST FOR INOCHI PROJECT + DESIGN YOUR OWN ANI-MECH CHARACTER TO GO IN THE GAME + ULTRA RARE ANI-MECH CHARACTER SKIN + HAVE AN IN-GAME STATUE OF YOUR ANI-MECH CHARACTER BUILT AND ON DISPLAY IN 'THE PARADE OF LEGENDS' AREA WITHIN SHINE CITY + YOUR NAME* DISPLAYED IN-GAME ON THE 'WALL OF LEGENDS MONUMENT' IN THE CENTRAL PLAZA OF SHINE CITY \u25cf GOLD GAME PACK + EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME CHARACTER SKIN + EXCLUSIVE GOLD PLAQUE FOR YOUR IN-GAME HOME AREA + EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER TEXTURE PACK + NAME IN CREDITS + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF SOUNDTRACK FROM INOCHI PROJECT + EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE GAME BETA VERSION + EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPER FORUM ============================== \u25cf  A rare and real opportunity to contribute to the Inochi Project is available at this reward tier. Working with our quest designers you will help create a unique gameplay element which has your designed Ani-Mech as the central AI controlled character for that quest. This unique quest will be named after you, the player who designed it \u25cf Work with our design team to design your own Ani-Mech character and have it featured in the game as an unlockable character and customisable components \u25cf Become one of only a handful of players who will have access to an ULTRA-RARE character skin \u25cf Plus you get to become one of the legends of Shine City by having a statue of your Ani-Mech character built and displayed in the Shine City 'Parade of Legends' area \u25cf You will also become part of Inochi History with your name appearing on "Wall of Legends" Monument. The ONLY WAY you can get your name on this monument is through this KICKSTARTER \u25cf Gold game pack: \u25cf 12 Month Subscription to the Game \u25cf Gold 'Mechoin' pack of in-game currency \u25cf Tantalise your ears with some of the soundtracks and audio themes from Inochi Project, as composed by W.Bone \u25cf Exclusive Character Skin for use in-game \u25cf Exclusive 'Legend Plaque' for your in-game home area \u25cf Exclusive "LEGEND BACKER" KickStarter texture pack for in-game characters \u25cf And if that's not enough your name will appear in the credits to the game under the GUEST QUEST DESIGNER Backer category.  [* Displayed names are subject to approval and cannot be inappropriate or offensive]

Approx: $8250, \u20ac5983 ============================== THE KING OF EXCLUSIVES ============================== The backer at this level gets to see THE RUST KING! ============================== \u25cf Entwined in myth, the most elusive yet central character to the whole Inochi World is the Rust King, and just one backer of Inochi Project from Kickstarter will get to see an image of him. It's true that the Rust King is so exclusive that even some of the design team have not seen him!
